casebody.data:
No. 68165 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 15, 2018

The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a the Bank of New York, as Trustee FOR the CERTIFICATEHOLDERS OF CWALT, INC., ALTERNATIVE LOAN TRUST 2005-1CB, MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2005-1CB, Appellant,
v.
SFR INVESTMENTS POOL 1, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; and Alessi & Koenig, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, Respondents.

AFFIRMED.
